description: Using Skype on a Mac you can customize the default SKYPECHATSTYLE file. Also, you can add other user-generated styles. You can access the SKYPECHATSTYLE file by right-clicking the Skype application in the Applications folder then selecting Show Package Contents then Contents → Resources → ChatStyles .
NOTE: Related to .SKYPEEMOTICONSET files referenced by Skype.

common_filenames.description: Panamericana.SkypeChatStyle - Default ChatStyle contained in Skype, can be replaced with other SKYPECHATSTYLE files.
